name: Adon Fox
description: While you defend, if you are stressed, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: AP-5
description: While you coordinate, if you chose a ship with exactly 1 stress token, it can perform actions.

name: Benthic Two Tubes
description: After you perform a [Focus] action, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship at range 1-2.

name: Captain Rex
description: After you perform an attack, assign the Suppressive Fire condition to the defender.

name: “Chopper”
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0 gains 2 jam tokens.

name: Dex Tiree
description: While you defend, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Edrio Two Tubes
description: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

name: Gemmer Sojan
description: While defending, you may gain 1 strain token to change up to 2 of your blank results to [Focus] results.

name: Heff Tobber
description: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0, you may perform an action.

name: “Zeb” Orrelios
description: While you defend, [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results.

name: Arvel Crynyd
description: If you would fail a [Boost] action by overlapping another ship, you may resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead. While you perform an attack at attack range 0, treat it as an attack at attack range 1.

name: Arvel Crynyd
description: While defending, you may gain a strain token to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] result.

name: Biggs Darklighter
description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 matching result.

name: Biggs Darklighter
description: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, treat your initiative as equal to the chosen ship's initiative until the end of the Activation Phase.

name: Cassian Andor
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

name: Clan Wren Volunteer
description: While you perform an attack at range 1, if the speed of your revealed maneuver matches that of a friendly ship at range 1, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Derek Klivian
description: After you acquire or spend a lock, you may remove 1 red token from yourself.

name: Dirk Ullodin
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1.

name: Esege Tuketu
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

name: Evaan Verlaine
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship rolls 1 additional defense die while defending until the end of the round.

name: Ezra Bridger
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

name: Ezra Bridger
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1 [Force] to change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade]/[Hit] results.

name: Ibtisam
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are stressed, you may roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, remove 1 stress token.

name: K-2SO
description: After you gain a stress token, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Kanan Jarrus
description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.

name: Keo Venzee
description: If you have no active [Force], after you reveal a bank [[Bank Left] or [Bank Right]] or turn [[Turn Left] or [Turn Right]] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, perform that maneuver as a sideslip and recover 1 [Force].

name: Kyle Katarn
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship in your firing arc.

name: “Leebo”
description: After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.

name: “Leebo”
description: At the end of the Engagement Phase, you may spend a calculate token to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 2-3.

name: Leevan Tenza
description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may perform a red [Evade] action.

name: Lowhhrick
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

name: Magva Yarro
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

name: Netrem Pollard
description: After you barrel roll, you may choose 1 friendly ship that is not stressed at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 stress token, then you rotate 180°.

name: “Pops” Krail
description: After you fully execute a white maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, it may perform a [Focus] action.

name: Sabine Wren
description: Before you activate, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

name: Sabine Wren
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the enemy ship's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

name: Alexsandr Kallus
description: While you defend, if the attacker modified any attack dice, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Bodhi Rook
description: Friendly ships can acquire locks onto objects at range 0-3 of any friendly ship.

name: Bodica Venj
description: After another friendly ship defends, if you are not depleted, you may perform a bonus primary attack against the attacker. If you do, after performing that attack, gain 1 deplete token.

name: Braylen Stramm
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

name: Braylen Stramm
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if a friendly Gina Moonsong ship at range 0-2 is stressed, you may gain a focus token.

name: Chewbacca
description: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 [Charge] to be dealt the card facedown instead.

name: “Dutch” Vander
description: After you perform the [Lock] action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

name: “Dutch” Vander
description: After you spend a lock during an attack, choose a friendly ship at range 1-3. The chosen ship may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Garven Dreis
description: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

name: Gavin Darklighter
description: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: Hol Okand
description: During the System Phasse, if there are no enemy ships at range 1-2, you may recover 1 [Charge] on any upgrade.

name: Horton Salm
description: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

name: Jake Farrell
description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a [Focus] action.

name: Jek Porkins
description: After you receive a stress token, you may roll 1 attack die to remove it. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

name: Kendy Idele
description: After you spend a green token, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-3 and gain a strain token. If you do, that ship may perform a red [Focus] or red [Evade] action.

name: Kullbee Sperado
description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, you may flip your equipped [Configuration] upgrade card.

name: Lieutenant Blount
description: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Miranda Doni
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

name: “Pops” Krail
description: While you perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Roark Garnet
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, it engages at initiative 7 instead of its standard initiative value this phase.

name: Saw Gerrera
description: While a damaged friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Shara Bey
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

name: Ten Numb
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Evade] or [Hit] results.

name: Wedge Antilles
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Wullffwarro
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Ahsoka Tano
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 and spend 2 [Force]. That ship may perform an action, even while stressed.

name: Airen Cracken
description: After you perform an attack, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. That ship may perform an action, treating it as red.

name: Corran Horn
description: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

name: Corran Horn
description: After you declare the defender of an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, a friendly ship may transfer their lock token from you to the defender.

name: Dash Rendar
description: While you move, you ignore obstacles.

name: Dash Rendar
description: During the Engagement Phase, you ignore the effects of obstacles that you are overlapping.

name: Dash Rendar
description: After you gain a red token as a result of moving through or overlapping an obstacle, you may transfer that red token to a friendly ship at range 0-1.

name: Gina Moonsong
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you must transfer 1 of your stress tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-2.

name: Gina Moonsong
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if a friendly Braylen Stramm ship at range 0-2 is stressed, you may acquire a lock.

name: Hera Syndulla
description: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

name: Jan Ors
description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc performs a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship may perform an action.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, choose an initiative value from 1 to 6. You activate at that initiative this phase.

name: Leia Organa
description: After a friendly ship fully executes a red maneuver, if it is at range 0-3, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token or recovers 1 [Force].

name: Luke Skywalker
description: After you become the defender (before dice are rolled), you may recover 1 [Force].

name: Luke Skywalker
description: After you are declared as the defender during an attack, you may recover 1 [Force].

name: Norra Wexley
description: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 [Evade] result to your dice results.

name: Thane Kyrell
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Focus], [Hit], or [Critical Hit] result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

name: Tycho Celchu
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may perform actions, even while stressed.

name: Tycho Celchu
description: While you are disarmed, you can still perform [Missile] attacks. When you perform a [Missile] attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 4 dice.

name: Wedge Antilles
description: While you perform a primary attack, if there is another friendly ship in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 less defense dice.

name: Wes Janson
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to assign the defender 1 jam token. After you defend, you may spend 1 [Charge] to assign the attacker 1 jam token.

name: Yendor
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may gain a strain token to reroll 1 of your blank results.

name: Fenn Rau
description: Before a friendly ship at range 1-2 engages, if there is an enemy ship in its [Front Arc] at range 1, that friendly ship may remove 1 non-lock red token.

name: Fenn Rau
description: Before an enemy ship in your firing arc engages, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify dice while it performs an attack during this phase.

name: Han Solo
description: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

name: Han Solo
description: After performing an attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Coordinate] action.

name: Hera Syndulla
description: While another friendly ship at range 1-2 defends or performs an attack, during a Modify Dice step, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens, evade tokens, or locks to that ship.

name: Wedge Antilles
description: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Wedge Antilles
description: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 focus token.
